name: @pojntfx/unisockets
description: A universal Berkeley sockets implementation for both WebAssembly (based on WebRTC) and native platforms with bindings for C, Go and TinyGo.

scripts.build: yarn build:lib && yarn build:bin && yarn build:web && yarn build:docs && yarn build:diagram
scripts.build:web: rm -rf static && cp -r out static && parcel build --out-dir browser ./cmd/unisockets_runner_web/index.html
scripts.build:docs: mkdir -p docs && typedoc --tsconfig -p tsconfig.json --mode file --out docs --media docs/media --exclude node_modules --exclude docs --exclude out --exclude dist --exclude static --exclude browser
scripts.dev:example-server: LOG_LEVEL=debug DEBUG='' ts-node-dev --files cmd/unisockets_runner/main.ts --runBinary true --useC true --useWASI true --binaryPath out/c/echo_server.wasm
scripts.dev:example-client: LOG_LEVEL=debug DEBUG='' ts-node-dev --files cmd/unisockets_runner/main.ts --runBinary true --useC true --useWASI true --binaryPath out/c/echo_client.wasm
scripts.dev:web: rm -rf static && cp -r out static && parcel --out-dir browser ./cmd/unisockets_runner_web/index.html

author: Felix Pojtinger <felix@pojtinger.com>
